task.title: How to add numbers
task.shortdesc: Here you will find instructions about using the sum up or addition feature of the JPS Calculator.

taskbody.prereq: To successfully add numbers ,you must know what is addition.
taskbody.result: The result from the addition is displayed.

example.p: Let's say you want to add 30 to 55 .The quation will look 55+35=90. You enter 55.Press add (+). Enter 35. Press equals(=).
The result 90 appears on the screen.
